name: Desert Stormfront (itch)
description: Desert Stormfront is a retro real-time strategy (RTS) game situated in the Middle East. The game is inspired by the "Classic Empire" game and designed towards casual players. Units at your disposal include Humvees, Tanks, Artillery, Mechanics, Helicopters, Planes, Ships and Submarines amongst others. Desert Stormfront supports multiplayer games over LAN and internet including co-op multiplayer.
